name: Z - Puzzle - Connect,Move and Match, Redefining Alphabet Game Free
name_original: Z - Puzzle - Connect,Move and Match, Redefining Alphabet Game Free
description:
******************************************************
Z -Alphabet Puzzle is fun and addicting game. It redefines alphabet in mathematical way.
Join the alphabet and get to the Z !
You will get A and B tiles. Swipe to move all tiles.
When two tiles with the same alphabet touch, they merge into one. A and A joins and becomes B. B and B joins and becomes C and so on.

A+A = B
B+B = C
C+C = D
D+D = E
..
Y+Y = Z (You Win !!)

Get to the Z tile, and reach a high score!

We are still playing and yet to win the game.

Play this simple, fun and addictive game.

Introducing 5*5 matrix.Now enjoy the challenge more on new 5*5 matrix.
*******************************************************
